
public class Tutorial05 {
	
	//To iterate a part of code multiple times.


	// -*structure and component*-

	//Initialization: 
	//Condition: 
	//Increment/Decrement: 
	//Statement: 

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		
//		for(int i = 1; i<=5;i++) {
//			System.out.println("techGiddion");
//		}
		
		//for-each loop or enhnaced for loop is used to 
		//iterate through elements of arrays and collections 

		//array - an array or a collection
		//item - each item of array/collection is assigned to this variable
		//dataType - the data type of the array/collection

		
		int [] array = {1,2,3,4,5};
		
          for(int item:array) {
	System.out.println(item);
}

	}

}
